title: Undo the Last Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase. One of the most common tasks in Git is undoing a commit. This lab will teach you how to undo the last commit without rewriting history.

meta.title: Undo the Last Git Commit
meta.description: Learn how to undo the last commit in Git without rewriting history, a crucial skill for version control management.
meta.keywords: revert, version control, git labs, git, commit history, git playground, undo commit

verify.name: Verify the success of the undo
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 撤销最后一次提交
i18n.description: Git是一个强大的版本控制系统，它允许开发者跟踪对其代码库所做的更改。Git中最常见的任务之一就是撤销提交。本实验将教你如何撤销最后一次提交而不重写历史记录。

meta.title: 撤销最后一次Git提交
meta.description: 学习如何在不重写历史记录的情况下撤销Git中的最后一次提交，这是版本控制管理的一项关键技能。
meta.keywords: 撤销, 版本控制, Git实验, Git, 提交历史记录, Git游乐场, 撤销提交

verify.name: 验证撤销操作是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
